pages.text: Scepters are magical sources from which you can cast many offensive and defensive spells. Spellcasting will involve crafting, imbuing, exploring, and the perseverance to upgrade your scepters, unlocking more and more powerful magics.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/basic_mat.text: Imbue or obtain an $(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/opal)Opal$() and some $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/beryl_copper)Beryllium Copper$()

amethyst_imbuement:progression/basic_spe.text: Craft your first $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/opaline_scepter)Opaline Scepter$() and cast $(l:amethyst_imbuement:spell_book/magic_missile)Magic Missile!$()
Imbue your first spell from the list of available $(l:amethyst_imbuement:spells/starter_spells)starter spells$(), and start casting it to begin upgrading your scepters power level.

amethyst_imbuement:arcane_researcher.text: Find and read Lore Books scattered around the world to start adding more powerful spells to your magical arsenal.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/tier_1_sc.text: Begin your journey on an upgrade path by continuing onto the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/scepter_upgrading)Scepter Upgrade Guide$()
